Register.subject: Quanta Cloud - Account validation
Register.message:
Welcome to Quanta Cloud and thank you for your registration.
To validate your account, follow this link : https://quantacloud.ch/core/Validate/Key/[id_user]/[key]
Best regards,
Quanta Cloud Team
